title: Standardize error handling
description: Replace broad except Exception with specific exception handling

title: Test drive health check script
description: Verify scripts/check-drive-health.sh works correctly

title: Homepage cleanup: Social/News + Gaming + Trading icons
description: Update Social & News category and fix remaining icons

title: Create Gabagool arbitrage strategy
description: Core strategy logic: calculate_mispricing(), should_enter() when spread > 2 cents, calculate_position_sizes() with inverse weighting (buy more of cheaper side). Implement dual-leg execution for YES+NO orders.

title: Create market finder for 15-minute markets
description: Query Gamma API to discover active BTC/ETH 15-minute up/down markets. Extract YES/NO token IDs. Track market resolution times. Cache market metadata.

title: Create position sizing module
description: Spread-based sizing formula: full size at 5 cent spread, scaled for smaller spreads. Inverse weighting: buy_yes = no_price/(yes+no), buy_no = yes_price/(yes+no). Max $5 per trade, $10 per window.

title: Create real-time order book tracker
description: Maintain real-time order book state from WebSocket. Track YES/NO best bid/ask prices. Calculate spread (1.0 - YES - NO) continuously. Emit opportunity signals when spread > threshold.

title: Setup new 6-drive RAID-Z2 pool (two-pool strategy)
description: Create new 6-drive RAID-Z2 pool alongside existing 4-drive pool. See agents/plans/ZFS_TWO_POOL_STRATEGY.md

title: Migrate ZFS from RAID-Z1 to RAID-Z2 (8 drives)
description: Migrate from 4-drive RAID-Z1 pool to 8-drive RAID-Z2 for better redundancy. See agents/plans/ZFS_RAIDZ1_TO_RAIDZ2_MIGRATION.md

title: Remove backward compat duplication in strategy.py
description: Remove duplicate enums in src/core/strategy.py

title: Create main.py entry point and runner
description: Main async event loop. Initialize client, WebSocket, strategies. Monitor markets continuously. Execute trades when opportunities detected. Handle graceful shutdown. Implement dry-run mode.

title: Polymarket Gabagool Arbitrage Trading Bot
description: Implement the gabagool22 asymmetric binary arbitrage strategy for Polymarket BTC/ETH 15-minute up/down markets. Strategy exploits temporary mispricing when YES+NO sum drops below $1.00, guaranteeing profit regardless of price direction. Starting capital: $100 USDC.

title: Create WebSocket streaming client
description: Connect to wss://ws-subscriptions-clob.polymarket.com/ws. Subscribe to BTC/ETH 15-minute market order books. Parse real-time price updates with orjson. Implement auto-reconnection logic.

title: WebSocket testing
description: Add WebSocket tests (no WS tests currently)

title: Media-Download Directory Cleanup
description: Clean up apps/media-download/ by removing stale files and outdated plans

title: Configure automated drive health monitoring/alerts
description: Set up automated alerts for drive health issues (email, webhook, or Grafana integration)

title: Sentiment provider base class
description: Reduce boilerplate in 13 providers

title: Homepage cleanup: Infrastructure category + icons
description: Update Infrastructure apps with correct icons

title: Update infrastructure docs after router migration
description: Update all infrastructure documentation to reflect new ASUS router setup

title: Create project structure and dependencies
description: Create apps/polymarket-bot/ directory structure with src/, scripts/, tests/ subdirectories. Add requirements.txt with py-clob-client, websockets, orjson, httpx, pydantic, structlog dependencies.

title: Set up ASUS routers with AdGuard DNS
description: Replace Google Home mesh with ASUS routers and configure DNS to point to AdGuard

title: IBKR integration testing
description: Paper trading validation for IBKR integration

title: Add missing type hints
description: Add missing type hints to range_bound.py and sentiment providers

title: Review current drive health status
description: Run initial drive health check and document status of all 4 ZFS pool drives

title: Setup SMART monitoring on server
description: Install and configure SMART monitoring tools. Run scripts/setup-smart-monitoring.sh

title: Create Polymarket CLOB client wrapper
description: Wrap py-clob-client with connection management, authentication, market data fetching, and order placement. Implement get_markets(), get_order_book(), create_market_order(), create_limit_order().

title: Standardize Traefik config: local DNS no-auth, external auth
description: Apply consistent Traefik configuration pattern across all apps. Local network (192.168.86.0/24) access without auth, external requires auth.

title: UI WebSocket integration
description: Dashboard real-time updates via WebSocket

title: Homepage cleanup: Media apps category + icons
description: Update all media apps to use si-* icons

title: Purchase ASUS RT-AX86U Pro + RT-AX58U routers
description: Purchase router equipment (~$350). RT-AX86U Pro (~$250) + RT-AX58U (~$100)

title: Create circuit breaker and risk management
description: Pre-trade validation (YES+NO < 1.00), daily loss tracking ($5 limit), max exposure per window ($10), max unhedged exposure, slippage monitoring. Implement trading halt at multiple severity levels.

title: Integration testing and dry-run validation
description: Run in dry-run mode for 24 hours. Verify correct opportunity detection. Validate position sizing calculations. Test circuit breaker triggers. Confirm WebSocket reconnection.

title: Add Prometheus metrics and monitoring
description: Track: market_spread_cents, expected_profit_usd, unhedged_exposure, order_latency_ms, daily_profit_usd, circuit_breaker_level. Set up alerting rules.

title: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml
description: Python 3.11 container. Mount .env file. Add to traefik network. Configure VPN container (gluetun) for geo-routing. Add homepage labels.

title: Create .env.template and config.py
description: Create .env.template with wallet credentials, API keys, Gabagool strategy settings (min_spread, position sizing, risk limits). Create config.py with Pydantic settings classes: PolymarketConfig and GabagoolConfig.

title: Standardize import patterns
description: Standardize import patterns, focus on sentiment providers

title: Consolidate metrics system (8 files → 3)
description: Reduce metrics system from 8 files to 3. Biggest code quality win. See IMPLEMENTATION_ROADMAP.md

title: Strategy-to-execution pipeline
description: Signal → order with safety checks

title: WebSocket data producer integration
description: Connect data to WebSocket streams

title: Homepage cleanup: Productivity category + icons
description: Consolidate all productivity apps under single Productivity category
